targets.expr: sum by (host_name) ( weka_stats{cluster="$cluster",category="ops",stat="OPS"} ) - sum by (host_name)( weka_stats{cluster="$cluster",category="ops",stat="READS"} or weka_stats{cluster="$cluster",category="ops_driver",stat="READS_RDMA"} )- sum by (host_name)( weka_stats{cluster="$cluster",category="ops",stat="WRITES"} or weka_stats{cluster="$cluster",category="ops_driver",stat="WRITES_RDMA"})

sum by (host_name) (weka_stats{cluster="$cluster",category="ops",stat="OPS"} ) - sum by (host_name) (weka_stats{cluster="$cluster",category="ops",stat="READS"}) - sum by (host_name) (weka_stats{cluster="$cluster",category="ops",stat="WRITES"})

topk( 5, sum by (host_name) (weka_stats{cluster="$cluster",category="ops",stat="OPS",host_role="client"}) - sum by (host_name) (weka_stats{cluster="$cluster",category="ops",stat="READS",host_role="client"} or weka_stats{cluster="$cluster",category="ops_driver",stat="READS_RDMA",host_role="client"}) - sum by (host_name) (weka_stats{cluster="$cluster",category="ops",stat="WRITES",host_role="client"} or weka_stats{cluster="$cluster",category="ops_driver",stat="WRITES_RDMA",host_role="client"}))
